title: Game Progress Route
content:
xplains the background of Runepowder. Your reply can be:

Runepowder? I thought that was a children's story. What use is a single vial? Deal. No deal.

Select the first option, and Philomeen confirms that it's real, but she can only spare one vial for you. An additional dialogue option appears, "I'll need to know a little more about your so-called 'mission' before I let you go."
